bug.short_desc: the systemd-nspawn manpage is not installed (is not included in binary package)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
systemd-nspawn has this epic manpage https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-nspawn.html
Package `systemd-container` includes `systemd-nspawn` but not the man page.
Filed under systemd, as there is no bugzilla component for systemd-container.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): systemd-container-231-10.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open Terminal 2. Type the command: man systemd-nspawn
Actual results: "No manual entry for systemd-nspawn"
Expected results: epic manual page as per https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-nspawn.html

(In reply to Alan Jenkins from comment #0) > systemd-nspawn has this epic manpage > https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-nspawn.html "epic" — I like that!
> Package `systemd-container` includes `systemd-nspawn` but not the man page. Actually it's just in the wrong package, see the "See also" bug. This was already fixed in rawhide.
> Filed under systemd, as there is no bugzilla component for systemd-container. Correct. bugzilla only has components for the source rpm.
> 2. Type the command: man systemd-nspawn > > Actual results: "No manual entry for systemd-nspawn" As a work-around, please install systemd-journal-remote.
systemd-231-11.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-32fddcfb44

systemd-231-11.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-32fddcfb44
systemd-231-11.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
